definition: lit. to take joy in calamity and delight in disaster (idiom); fig. to rejoice in other people's misfortune/Schadenfreude
trusted/intimate/(of the emperor) to visit/variant of 幸[xing4]

sentences.english: He gloated over his brother's failure to win the prize.
sentences.chinese: 他弟弟未能获奖，他却幸灾乐祸。

sentences.english: When she saw that his family was ruined, she gloated at his misfortune.
sentences.chinese: 看到他家破人亡，她却幸灾乐祸地笑了。

sentences.english: They gloat at his legislative setbacks.
sentences.chinese: 这些人对他在立法机关所受的挫折幸灾乐祸。

sentences.english: He was gloating over the ruin of his rival.
sentences.chinese: 他幸灾乐祸地看著他的对手身败名裂。

sentences.english: But that schadenfreude doesn't last long.
sentences.chinese: 但那种幸灾乐祸不会持续很久。

sentences.english: Aside of schadenfreude SuiYu, didnt also able to survive, Allah is often come in.
sentences.chinese: 一旁幸灾乐祸的隋玉，也没能幸免，被常安拉了进来。
有时候原始兽太幸灾乐祸了。

sentences.english: He often rejoices at other people's misfortunes.
sentences.chinese: 他常常对别人幸灾乐祸。

sentences.english: Instead of exulting over his failure, you should have lent him a helping hand.
sentences.chinese: 你不应该对他的失败幸灾乐祸，而应帮他一把。

sentences.english: They go back to the house empty-handed, and Magan's little brother is gloating.
sentences.chinese: 他们空手而归，马江的弟弟有点幸灾乐祸。

sentences.english: Vanessa: I could take this opportunity to gloat, but I actually like you.
sentences.chinese: 我该趁这个机会幸灾乐祸一下，不过我真的喜欢你。

sentences.english: Don't gloat,the same misfortune may happen to you one day.
sentences.chinese: 不要幸灾乐祸，说不定同样的不幸会落到你的头上。

sentences.english: It seemed to him that the house was full of leering eyes glorying in his misfortune.
sentences.chinese: 他觉得满屋子到处是幸灾乐祸的眼睛对他嘲笑。

definition: to tease/to poke fun at/to make fun of
to harbor evil designs/to harbor malicious intentions
to disdain to do sth/to think sth not worth doing/to feel it beneath one's dignity
to wish for the whole world to be in chaos (idiom)
pinyin: wei2 kong3 tian1 xia4 bu4 luan4

definition: to watch with amusement as sb makes a fool of himself
to despise/to disdain/to look down upon
